remarks: The ordering of two Hilbert lattice elements (under the fiducial hyperplane ` W ` ) is determined by the translations whose traces are under them.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Mar-2014.)
statement:
trlord.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
trlord.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
trlord.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trlord.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlord.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlord.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlord $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) /\ ( Y e. B /\ Y .<_ W ) ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> A. f e. T ( ( R ` f ) .<_ X -> ( R ` f ) .<_ Y ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ f $.
$d B f $.
$d H f $.
$d K f $.
$d R f $.
$d T f $.
$d W f $.
$d X f $.
$d Y f $.
